attributes.action: act to amend the regulations of the hague convention to take the views of the child(ren) concerned
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: my seven yr old daughter was ordered to return to spain after living in the uk for 13 months,She was not heard or considered .Things have to change.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "act to amend the regulations of the hague convention to take the views of the child(ren) concerned."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11592.asp

Prime Minister's Office
